title: Judged
description: On the run for her life, Serena Hart's was wanted by the most notorious of men,The Don, AKA Garcia Alberto. Sending his best man to collect his prize. Reece Dayton not a man who wanted to go finding the girl her boss wanted. No choice he takes to the task of collecting her. She proves to be more than she let's on. Reece finds himself lusting over the Don's girl... This was bad...This was very very bad. Warning: This book contains material of sex and submission, and some violence. It is recommended for readers over the age of 18. If this material offends please refrain from reading.
author: E.L. Beth
